cells.data:
[source](https://www.typescriptlang.org/docs/handbook/react-&-webpack.html)

## awesome-typescript-loader
helps Webpack compile your TS code using the TS's standard config file ts.config.json.

## source-map-loader
uses sourcemap output from TS and informs Webpack when it creates its own sourcemap.
Helps debug the transpiled code as if you were debugging the original.
